comment.text: This translation key is used to display the label "Make Form" in a dialog window when converting a file. The translated text will be shown as a button or heading within this dialog, allowing users to create a new form based on an existing document.

usage.context:
disabled: false,
 },
 {
 id: "option_make-form",
 key: "make-form",
 label: t("Common:MakeForm"),
 icon: FormPlusReactSvgUrl,
 onClick: () => this.onClickMakeForm(item, t),
 disabled: false,
 },
 separator0,

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "حفظ بصيغة اوفورم" is a transliteration of "Save as PDF form" and doesn't accurately convey the meaning. "اوفورم" is understood, but it's not a standard term. A more accurate translation would capture the concept of saving in PDF format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: حفظ كنموذج PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a loanword ('اوفورم') that may not be familiar to all users.  While understandable, it’s better to use standard Arabic terms where possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: حفظ كنموذج PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation 'Formanı yarat' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'Save as PDF form'. It translates to 'Create your form', which is not the intended action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like 'PDF kimi saxlayın' (Save as PDF) or 'PDF formatında saxlayın' (Save in PDF format).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Αποθήκευση ως oform" is not an accurate translation of "Save as PDF form". "oform" is not a standard term for a PDF form in Greek. The term "φόρμα" (forma) is the standard equivalent of 'form'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Αποθήκευση ως PDF φόρμα

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Պահպանել որպես PDF-ի ձև" is a literal translation and not the most natural way to express "Save as PDF form" in Armenian. It reads a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more idiomatic translation like "Պահպանել PDF ձևաչափով" or "Պահպանել որպես PDF ձև".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "다른 이름으로 저장 oform" is not an accurate translation of "Save as PDF form." The term 'oform' is not standard Korean and doesn't convey the meaning of 'form'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 다른 이름으로 PDF 양식 저장 (Dareun ireumeuro PDF yangsik jeong) - This translates to 'Save PDF form as another name'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation lacks proper spacing.  It's not standard practice to have the word 'oform' directly attached.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The suggestion in the previous issue addresses this as well.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ບັນທຶກເປັນ oform' is not an accurate translation of 'Save as PDF form'. 'oform' appears to be a misinterpretation or misspelling. It doesn't convey the meaning of a PDF form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບັນທຶກເປັນແບບຟອມ PDF (Banthik pen baep form PDF)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'oform' is not a recognized Lao word in this context. It appears to be a misspelling or a misunderstanding of the English term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແບບຟອມ (baep form) – form

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Saglabāt kā oform' is not an accurate translation of 'Save as PDF form'. 'Oform' doesn't directly translate to 'form' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be 'Saglabāt kā PDF veidne' or 'Saglabāt PDF formā'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Opslaan als oform' does not accurately reflect the meaning of 'Save as PDF form'. The term 'oform' seems to be a typo or incorrect rendering of 'PDF-formulier'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Opslaan als PDF-formulier

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'oform' appears to be a misspelling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: formulier

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation 'Zapisz jako oform' is not an accurate translation of 'Save as PDF form'. 'Oform' is not a recognized term in Polish related to forms or documents. It appears to be a combination of words and doesn't convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be 'Zapisz jako formularz PDF' or 'Zapisz jako PDF'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Salvar como formato PDF" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Save as PDF form". While technically correct, it's a bit literal. A more idiomatic translation would be something like "Salvar como formulário PDF".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Salvar como formulário PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'OFORM ලෙස සුරකින්න' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Save as PDF form". 'OFORM' seems to be an incomplete or incorrect transliteration. It doesn't establish the PDF format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පී.ඩී.එෆ්. ආකෘතිය ලෙස සුරකින්න (PDF Aakruthya lesa surakkinna)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Uložiť ako oform' is not an accurate translation of 'Save as PDF form'. 'Oform' is not a standard Slovak term for a PDF form. A more accurate translation would be 'Uložiť ako formulár PDF' or 'Uložiť do formátu PDF'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uložiť ako formulár PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Shrani kot oform' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Save as PDF form'. 'Oform' suggests a generic form, not specifically a PDF form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Shrani kot PDF obrazec

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Сачувај у PDF формату" is understandable, a more natural and precise translation would be "Сними као PDF образац" or "Сачувај као PDF образац".  The word 'формату' (format) isn't quite right; 'образцу' (form) or 'образца' is better for a form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сними као PDF образац

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'oform olarak Kaydet' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Save as PDF form'. 'oform' is not a standard way to refer to a PDF form. 'Olarak' is also unnecessary and grammatically awkward here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaydet PDF olarak

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word order and preposition usage ('olarak') are not natural in this context. It sounds stiff and unnatural for a user interface label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaydet PDF olarak

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lưu dưới dạng oform' is not accurate. 'oform' is not a recognized term in Vietnamese relating to PDF forms. It appears to be a combination of 'of' and 'form', which is not correct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lưu dưới dạng biểu mẫu PDF

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly an error, the phrase 'dạng oform' lacks fluency. The word 'dạng' and the added 'o' create an awkward phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lưu dưới dạng biểu mẫu PDF
